about_the_game:
Created in the spirit of early console RPGs, this pack of 50 battlers by artist Tyler Warren brings 50 more fresh options to the professional and amateur game creator. Carefully crafted in a style comparable to the immensely popular Dragon Quest (Dragon Warrior) series, this set features monsters ranging from cute to colossal. Trolls, bugs, slimes, elementals, beasts, animals, flyers, and many others. Recently remastered for use in RPG Maker MV.

Features:

- 50 unique battlers
- Files formatted for easy Plug and Play into RPG Maker MV
- All 50 battlers are presented in sizes ranging from large to small; let the slime be the boss with no scaling issues
- Battlers also come in recommended sizes (proportional to each other) for RPG Maker MV
- Art style similar in spirit to the classic whimsical RPG characters of Dragon Quest (Dragon Warrior)
- Recently remastered for sharper colors and better usability

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
detailed_description:
Please read before you buy!

Please note that "RPG Maker MZ - Tyler Warren RPG Battlers - 2nd 50" and "RPG Maker MV - Tyler Warren RPG Battlers - 2nd 50" are the same pack, only the title "MV" and "MZ" are different. The content in these packs are exactly the same, so if you already have one of these packs, you don't have to purchase the other!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

short_description: Tyler Warren is back with 50 more colorful characters created in the spirit and style of classic RPGs!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Arabic, Simplified Chinese
